The city: s pension system was only 20% funded, well below the recommended 80% funding level by the U.S. Government Accountability Office.
The fund had: 283 million in assets on October 22, as reported by a blog posting from reporter Ted Nesi.
The city needed: 1.2 billion to cover its current and future pension obligations, according to the latest actuary report released on January 31, 2014.
